short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This plugin shows random cooking recipes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is perfect for busy women who are always looking for new meal ideas and want to simplify their meal planning. With a click of a button, you can get a random recipe from the MealDB API and use it as inspiration for your next meal. Whether you're a beginner or an experienced cook, this extension can help you discover new dishes and flavors, and make your cooking experience more enjoyable and effortless. Give it a try and see how it can make your daily routine easier and more exciting!
